author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: Finally seeing some greed on the timeline. Decided to DCA Sell more $ETH here. Sold 20% of my ETH near 4600. Still have 60% of my ETH Bag. The Grayscale Staking News is a good point to tp. Staking ETF is the last catalyst I have been waiting for. Once that goes live, I am out.
